Package com.project.capstone.sales

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.project.capstone.sales.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class Item extends Object implements Serializable
This is the Model class for the Item entity. This is linked to the Item table in the database.
